scripts.deploy_all:cyber: source .env.cyber && FOUNDRY_PROFILE=prd forge script script/DeployAll.s.sol:DeployAll --rpc-url $RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY   --broadcast --verify --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://cyberscan.co/api --chain-id 7560 --slow -vvv
scripts.verify_gas_bridge:sepolia: source .env.sepolia &&  ETHERSCAN_API_KEY=$API_KEY forge verify-contract --chain-id 11155111  --compiler-version v0.8.14+commit.80d49f37  --constructor-args 0000000000000000000000007884f7f04f994da14302a16cf15e597e31eebecf 0x26eb5499461f14b00f4c4ef52bf29264476018b3 src/periphery/GasBridge.sol:GasBridge
